website_summaries.verdict: Customers seeking a reliable iPhone wallet case will be impressed with this highly rated model.
pros: Edges raised for further screen protection
cons: Some customers say case works well only for about a year

customer_reviews.title: Covers camera!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this wallet except that camera lens is half covered! How has no other review mentioned this?! I have an iphone 6s and have the remove it from the wallet case anytime I need to snap a pic. Huge bummer
customer_reviews.author: KT 650

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited when I purchased wallet. But after a few days of using it, i noticed the inside of card holder was torn and card was sliding out from the sides. Also rubber around phone chipped off. It was not as durable as it seems. Only positive thing I can say, is that is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I love my new phone wallet!
customer_reviews.text: It is slim & can still fit in my pocket. This is the first time that I’ve had a wallet type case. My phone fits in it perfectly. I also include a couple of cards that I need to carry with me. I no longer need to drag my pocketbook everywhere. It appears well made and looks stylish. I ordered the gold & it’s a nice, subdued color. It also allows the apple logo to show through in the back which my other case covered up. It is easy to text or take photos while it’s in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT CASE!
customer_reviews.text: I recently received the Rose Gold IPhone 7 case and I LOVE it! It is not only the perfect complimenting color, but it secures My phone with perfect access to all buttons, and it has the 3 card slots I was looking for! (For now I am carrying a diaper bag and not a purse, so I really need my cards/phone easily accessible. And my rare times sans Baby, I just grab My phone and go!)The material appears very sturdy and it comes with a product warranty! I have already been contacted by one of the owners of the company to ensure I am satisfied with their product! Excellent costumer service! I will definitely recommend buying one of their products!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: This case is gorgeous. I included a picture below so you can see that the real product looks exactly like the one in the photos. It came with a new screen protector as well, which I wasn't expecting! It was really easy to apply, and I honestly can't get over how nice and new my phone looks. As for the wallet portion, I can fit about 2 cards in each slot, which works great for me! There is also a pocket behind the slots where you can slip money or additional cards. As someone who doesn't enjoy carrying a purse, this is absolutely perfect for taking everything I need with me without having to lug around a bag!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Lent

customer_reviews.title: BEST WALLET CASE IN THE WORLD
customer_reviews.text: This case is absolutely amazing it feels and looks professional. I love the slim design which makes it easy to slip into your pocket. I also like how they include a screen protector. The packaging is another level it feels almost as if your about to open up a new phone! Great product defiantly recommend this to everyone looking for a wallet case.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Pecina

customer_reviews.title: No need for a wallet
customer_reviews.text: I've used this case for several years. It also serves as a wallet for me. I'm able to store up to 5 cards and my driver's license as well as an emergency $20 in the case. I haven't carried a wallet now for many years. This case is the best of the bunch. Well made and durable, this should last for at least 2 years of heavy use. Nice cutouts for the Apple logk, speaker, microphone and camera lens.
customer_reviews.author: Snapperhead

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wallet Case
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy wallet case for the 6S Plus iPhone. Purchased this for the wife after she wore out her previous model from another manufacturer. She had the previous for approximately 2 years and loved it. I have no indications that this wallet case will not last as long if not longer. The features that are important to her were the 3 slots for credit cards and a cash pocket. She carries typically 3-5 cards and 3-5 bills in the wallet and has no problem with the magnetic catch closing and staying latched.
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: This product is fantastic, and delivery was great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have had this case for a month, and it shows no wear at all. I have dropped my phone a lot-I just do-and it has protected it. The extra pocket is great, and I love the card keepers- there are three of them. The color matches my rose gold iPhone perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Series Fan

customer_reviews.title: At first I loved it...
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved it... I wanted to keep loving it for the stylishness and the fact it's the first case I've had that didn't bend in the camera corner. I loved that they cutout that area to avoid wallet bends. After the 5th month though, the fabric started to come away or the glue started to wear off, specifically on the edge sidings of the phone carrier so I had to cut off the excess to keep it from flapping. Either way, I've since upgraded phones and am wary to buy this brand again. It is a stylish brand though and if I were someone who changed cases every 6 months, I'd certainly keep buying this.
customer_reviews.author: GRRRLTRAVELER

customer_reviews.title: Elegant phone case
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for my iPhone 8. It's a wonderful-looking case that fits perfectly and snugly, offering screen protection when in pocket. I normally don't hold credit cards in these types of wallet cases, so I can't speak to the durability of the slots. But as an elegant-looking phone cover, it gets the job done and then some. The case also comes with a screen protector to further prevent scratches on the front of your phone, which is a very nice touch. I'm only knocking off one star because the magnet strength appears to be weaker than a comparable case I had for a different phone. Otherwise, I believe it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty, practical, and protects my phone
customer_reviews.text: This case is so nice. The faux leather is durable and wraps around the hard shell protecting the phone, in cheaper phone cases they usually just glue this part onto the wallet. It is very secure and the shell is high quality, I already have a few bruises on it from dropping my phone, and it protected the phone with no cracks or dents. I also really liked the free screen protector that came in the fancy box with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Dahlke

customer_reviews.title: MEASURE CORRECTLY
customer_reviews.text: I was so mad when I first got it and it was too big. I asked for a return label stating that it was the wrong size per the description but I was wrong. I ordered the 5.5" wallet case when I should have gotten the 4.7". Hopefully no one else makes the same mistake. I measured my iPhone from top to bottom instead of measuring the screen diagonally from corner to corner... not the phone itself. The one I returned was burgundy which is really nice but when I reordered it in the CORRECT size decided to get the Rose Gold color to match my phone. Very happy with both my purchase and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mil

customer_reviews.title: Thin, lightweight and sturdy—-you will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Need to replace my old IPhone wallet case. Love this one!! Creates a thin profile and lightweight compared to my old wallet case, even with 3 card slots and extra pocket. The Desert Sky color combo is very attractive. Wish it came in more vivid colors/combos as makes it easier to see across the room at home and in a purse when out. But no complaints and seems very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi La Sardine

customer_reviews.title: Nice for Traveling-not for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems very decent. Magnetized latch works well. Pretty color. I do find that as an active person this type of case gets in the way-I.e. Skiing and trying to take pictures. It seems cumbersome for things such as that. It would be great though if on vacation and you wanted to consolidate your phone and a few debit/credit cards. This doesn't have as many slots for cards as I have seen on others and I wouldn't put more than 3 cards in this case, otherwise it gets very bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E Williams

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I saw this phone case. I thought it was a pretty design and I loved the dark burgundy color. I don’t recommend this phone case though; I was disappointed when it arrived and it covered my camera. Sending it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Making this Home

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant Color
customer_reviews.text: Such a tough little case. I thought it would be difficult to lose with my DL and credit card, but still closes just fine! There’s even enough room for a couple of dollars. Had a bit of trouble putting the protective screen, lots of bubbles to get out. Took more than a few minutes, but I got it done.
customer_reviews.author: Happy in Texas

customer_reviews.title: High quality product from reputable company
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered an i6 phone wallet cover for my wife's iPhone. When it arrived, it did not fit & I contacted LUPA the manufacturer right away. They were very personable and immediately authorized the return. Upon further inspection, I found that I was the one who made the mistake because her phone was an i7 Phone. We reordered and everything arrived in a day and fit perfectly. My wife is so delighted with it and has told all of our friends about the beautiful product. I can't say enough for the LUPA folks for their kindness and understanding. The owner even followed-up with me each time to make sure we were totally happy. Thanks again LUPA you'te the best.
customer_reviews.author: Charles j. RIZZO

customer_reviews.title: Quality Wallet Case
customer_reviews.text: I continue to order this particular wallet case from LUPA, it's very high quality, long lasting, and very professional looking. It has everything I want, a cover over the actual screen, the magnetic snap, and the three card slots with the tuckaway wallet. Simple, yet great design. I had a blue one prior to this brown one and it lasted for almost 2 years, and I could have continued using it, but wanted to change to a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy P

customer_reviews.title: IPHONE 6 PLUS WILL NOT FIT
customer_reviews.text: I own an iPhone 6 Pus, and I was happy to receive my new phone wallet today. I ordered the light brown, and the color was exactly what I ordered. This is an attractive case, but not much integrity went into making it. The real problem is, my iPhone 6 Plus will “no way” fit this case! I tried every method I could think of, but my phone is too large for the case. I am puzzled, because reviews from iPhone 6 Plus customers are very good. To add to my frustration! As an Amazon customer for many years, their service has been good, but lately, I have experienced one problem
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Very Functional!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many cases and this one seems to be the best so far. Hoping that the durability will be longer than my previous ones.....stay tuned. The magnet closure is very strong. I can fit a few business cards, drivers license, and some bills in it and still closes fine. I like that it has the option of a "pocket" behind the card slots....this helps to keep my business cards clean whereas I had a problem with that with other cases. I love the rosegold color as it matches the rosegold color of my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: R. Eberhard

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Love how this case is very lightweight. It's not much thicker or heavier than carrying the iPhone 8 itself. That being said, because it's so thin, I think if too many cards are placed inside the slots, the flap might not fall as nicely on the phone. But that's a problem with any flap wallet with slots only on one side. I don't use it as a wallet; I only have one library card in a slot, and already I can tell that the cover is bowing a little bit. However, the price point is great, and the quality of the leather is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: R. Choudhury

customer_reviews.title: Protecting Iphones back and. Front
customer_reviews.text: My grandson had one of these and it is like a book...but has a magnetic tab that locks...the bac to the front...Best is that you can keep license,money and credit card in the left hand side..Weighs very little and is compact...Really neat to carry at times..You do not need a purse...Love thisfs. This site had choices...many do not...Love the material That the cover is made of...welll made...Rec'd the item in two days..grea service
customer_reviews.author: sooer 37

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I love wallet cases because they are so practical, but this one is terrible quality. It seemed fine for the first few days, and I really liked it until it started falling apart. The material and the glue are both bad quality. That’s what I get for buying the cheapest case. It does come in a cool box though...
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Does not protect
customer_reviews.text: This product looks and feels nice. However, it does not protect the phone. I bought this for my mother because she likes wallet cases. Once she dropped the phone, the screen shattered. It was dropped on its side, which the phone case should have protected. The case did not serve its function - it is just for show. I am truly disappointed in this product. I spent over $20 assuming that it is a good product, but ended up with a broken screen. Now I need to spend more money to have the screen replaced. I wish I could return this product because after replacing the screen, I will buy a different (better) case to prevent another shattered screen.
customer_reviews.author: hosea huynh

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking phone case
customer_reviews.text: I got this cell phone case for an iPhone 8. It fits perfectly. It is well made and very sharp appearing with a two tone/color block leather construction. It opens and closes easily. When used as a phone the cover flips back, is held open with the magnetic tab, making it easier to hold while talking. Better than any other case/protective cover i have used in the past. I can't rate durability yet, but will come back in 6 months and let you know. Well done Lupa!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great case-excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can charge my phone On a charging platform without removing the cover. The forward folding credit card holder and snap close are a welcome bonus as I didn't have a snap on my last case and as the leather stretched cards were.calling out of the slots. The case is attractive and subtle. I don't want.My iPhone to be something others immediately notice. Lastly, I am very happy with the level of customer service from the time my order was placed and going forward. Two other family members have bought similar LUPA cases for their phones and are similarly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Doesn't Last.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this product long at all and it's already torn in several places. The wallet part is torn and the edges are torn and peeling. I LOVE the color and the freedom the product has given me. I used to carry a purse around with me everywhere. Now, I just grab my phone and keys and just GO. But unfortunately, I need to repurchase another phone wallet that will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: shandajeanette

customer_reviews.title: Cannot charge with case on!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware: This is the worst case ever- it has to be removed in order for a lightning cable to be connected properly to the charging port. The bottom lip on the case is way too big and does not allow proper access to the port. Returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Thien-Y Trinh

customer_reviews.title: Started peeling off after a couple of weeks
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for the product, but after a couple of weeks of using it, the corner started peeling off as if it was glued poorly. I was expecting it to have better quality. Other than that, cards fit perfectly and it is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Pierre Miralda

customer_reviews.title: Professional, sleek,  and fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I always had my eye on an Iphone wallet for two important reasons. First reason is it eliminates carrying around a traditional wallet that I stuff one too many things into that serve no real purpose in my everyday life. The second reason is it compliments my line of work offering a sleek and convenient slot for my business cards, credit card, photo ID when I am out and about networking. The color options for the wallets are in good taste, professional, and they fit snug and comfortable around the IPhone without being overly bulky in nature. I am very pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy P

customer_reviews.title: Ummm Title
customer_reviews.text: I give it 3 stars because I just bought it and haven’t seen its potential yet but will change when something happens. I brought this for my mom and was surprised by the quality and feel of the case, for the price. It is a slim case with pockets for a few cards. I really like the color choices especially the blue/tan one. It come with a 1 year warranty and a thin screen film. The only things I see for improvement at the moment is lengthen the hinge a few so it sits flat when stuffed with cards.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel E.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and practical
customer_reviews.text: It works! The texture feels more plastic-y than real leather would ever feel, but it's sturdy, the stitching is neat w/ no loose thread sticking out, and it fits my iphone 8. The magnet works well (might attract other metal items to your phone), but it does its job in keeping my iphone cover closed. And the card slots are perfect for my cards. Very happy w/ this purchase, esp. given the price. Also, I randomly ran into another person who had the same phone wallet (in the same color, no less), so I'm guessing this a widely popular purchase. As someone who takes internet reviews with a grain of salt, I'd say I'm glad I purchased this item.
customer_reviews.author: S. H.

customer_reviews.title: Best iphone case ever/ beautifully packaged
customer_reviews.text: Very fancy packaging that makes a lovely and classy presentation of the product. Well crafted case with tight, even stitches and finished edges. Feels like real leather. These last a long time and help prevent cracks and screen breakage if you drop the phone. Keep cover closed when you're not using the phone and you will be keeping your phone cleaner and safe from breakage. This is my second one from this manufacturer. The first one lasted me a good 2 years. It's durable and attractive and you can keep a few cards in the slots like your license, credit card, and bank card. I highly recommend it. I'll post photos later.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Stuff on Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Desert Sky color. Very classy look. iPhone 8 fits perfectly into the slot. Lightweight and easy to hold open to take pictures. A nice touch is that when it's open the close tab will fold back and a magnet catches it to keep it out of the way. Slots for ID and 2 cards. Small amp of cash. Beats a wristlet purse any day to use instead of a full purse,
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: Slim and handy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my new iPhone and I love it. It is slim, yet allows me to carry some bills and a few cards without becoming too bulky. It fits snuggly in my back jeans pocket without causing a big butt bulge!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Value-Priced Protection
customer_reviews.text: My refurbished iPhone is cherished and protected with this cute, stylish wallet case. Although my first iPhone was NEW, a gift with a name brand, high priced wallet case ... it got dropped and screen cracked. This is my second iphone and second case, I love it. This case is cute, quickly installed, easy to use and find in my big shoulder bag, fits in my small cross-body purse too. It replaces a standard silicon - bumper case with a little style, 3 card slots, small screen cloth and a cash spot.
customer_reviews.author: Lynrie

customer_reviews.title: The perfect case
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect phone case! Everything fits perfectly, and the quality is top notch. Real, nicely finished leather,and a very good quality magnetic clasp to keep it all secure. The best thing of all, is that it allows the phone to lock directly onto a dock, without being removed from the case! Convenience, good looks and price--the perfect combination.
customer_reviews.author: Canny shopper

customer_reviews.title: Need a design that accommodates more cards/cash
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and vibrant purple! Easy to find wallet if I’m using a purse. However, my needs are greater than most phone wallets accommodate. I carry about 8 cards of varying thickness, which include my AAA card and health cards, license and a little cash. This wallet does not accommodate them well. But, in fairness, it’s not intended to hold as much. The magnet tab cannot wrap around and hold the wallet closed. If I could carry only 6 cards and no cash, the wallet works as it’s intended!! Very nicely! Would you please consider making a newer design that will hold 1-2 additional cards and at least two bills and market it as such. Thank you for your consideration!!
customer_reviews.author: brendesou

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan with design compromises you might not like.
customer_reviews.text: Durability? Not a prayer. 6 months old and melting from normal hand oils and sweat. Plasticine dream material covering. Strong impact resistance and great overleaf closure with embedded metal sheet to thwart miscreants stealing your swipe info. Blocks the camera when opened but, works for a pseudo landscape viewer. Overall I liked It excepting the compromises mentioned which cost me at purchase just $12. But now Amazon has it listed at )19.99. Too expensive for a 6 month lifespan, I think. Moving on to other options now.
customer_reviews.author: Otto Bhan

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and works well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace another new case which held the phone by a magnet. Although I had had a similar case for my iPhone 6 the new one did not hold the iPhone 8 strongly enough and it kept falling out. So I bought this one and I like it. I miss the convenience of removing the phone when using as a camera, but this works okay, just have to move the strap out of the way. I love the rose gold cover and it fits four credit cards, an rfid blocker and a couple of bills. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mjddon

customer_reviews.title: Vinyl separating from case
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case for 9 months & really liked it at first. Magnetic closure is strong, protects my phone well. However about 2 months ago the vinyl on the corners started wearing down. I didn’t think much of it as the plastic corners still held the phone in place. But a few days ago the vinyl started separating from the case & other corners are peeling. It’s not even a year old. Would like Lupa to respond to me to see if we can do anything about this? I’m bummed because I like the design & it’s light, but shouldn’t be falling apart in less than a year!
customer_reviews.author: denvergirl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - edited 11/19/2019
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to replace the Versus brand which had some substantive leather, broke-in like leather, became supple. This one looked similar, but thin, too delicate. NO magnetism. Will not close at all. Will not hold credit cards and folding money. Cannot use. Went back to my well worn but really good Versus. 11/19/2019 Problem is with spine. Slightly more material would allow it to close properly, hold enough cards, accommodate folding money & magnetic clasp to close. In all other aspects, fine product. Leather looks, feels good. Really protects my phone. Works well without the folding money
customer_reviews.author: Cadillac

customer_reviews.title: This is the way a business should be run!
customer_reviews.text: What a refreshing experience. As a consumer, I make "unser$20" purchases frequently. I rarely think of the buying experience when doing so. Lupa is different. Such attention to detail is rare. Packaging, personal follow up, commitment to make things right. Much appreciated. Now to the product itself. Phone fits, cards and cash fit as expected. Very attractive. Closure magnet does its job with a solid hold. Screen protector is a nice plus. Simple, well designed and fit for use... And a memorable experience, as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 weeks the stitching started to fray. Now I've had it for 2 months and as you can see from the photo, the stitching separating the card part from the cash pocket is completely torn through. The slots that hold the cards stretch really easily and stuff falls out. Also, the material around the side has already completely torn away from the plastic. I understand that you get what you pay for, but if you buy this you'll be ordering a new case within a few weeks. Overall very disappointed, DO NOT waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Riane

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to combine a phone case with a wallet.
customer_reviews.text: The wallet case looks elegant and is functionally efficient. It holds all the cards that I most use, and has space for a bit of cash, so I no longer need to carry a wallet. All that other stuff that used to bloat my wallet? I now keep rarely used items (e.g., AAA card, park passes, specialty credit cards, library cards, etc) in my vehicle. The craftsmanship seems solid, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Meecham

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Case for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mom, who had been using a basic plastic bumper cover (try saying that four times fast) which didn't protect the face of the phone and was getting a little worse for the wear. The wallet style is convienient without being bulky, and it seems sturdy enough to provide good basic photection for the front and back of the phone. I was impressed with the magnetic closure; it seems strong enough to keep the case securely closed. Don't expect this case to offer the protection of an Otterbox, but for a fraction of the price, I think this is an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Canyonguy

customer_reviews.title: Great craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this wallet case!! It’s so sturdy and durable and the color is very pretty in person. I love that I can just grab my cellphone and keys and go since my wallet and phone are one now. Cards are easy to get in and out too. At first I wished there was a clear pocket for my ID, but realized then that my ID would be visible to everyone every time I opened my case.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Y

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure when I placed this order if it was the right case. I wanted to be able to carry my iPhone, credit card, and license in a slim, easy to carry case. One that could carry in my pocket as well. I was pleasantly surprised that this case met all my needs and I can even stick a bill($) or two in the case as well. It is lightweight, slim, and durable. I am more than pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gramz

customer_reviews.title: What happend to the wrist strap?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case b/c I needed a new phone and purchased the iPhone 8. The older case was beautiful in rose gold but the new larger camera was partially covered, so I had to order a new one. The rose gold was sold out, so I chose the burgundy. It is lovely but I miss the wrist strap!! I would prefer to have the wrist strap but it wasn't an option. I find cell phones awkward to old (hand arthritis) and the strap helped. Please add it back to future models.
customer_reviews.author: Michele C

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't Burgundy, it was brick red. Looks, feels and is cheap! The case lining came undone within a day's use, and I only kept 3 cards in there. Very disappointed in the quality; have purchased from them before but won't from here on.
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after a few months
customer_reviews.text: The case came looking a bit more pleathery (shiny and a bit plastic feeling) than I'd like, which I was actually okay with, since functionally, it worked quite well for my purpose (hence two stars). However, after only 4 months of use, the edges are starting to peel back from the phone holder. I've already re-glued a couple sections, but other areas are coming undone, and at this point, I have to start looking for a replacement. If you're looking for a case that is going to last long term, I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer123

customer_reviews.title: It fits wonderfully and I loved the navy and leather look
customer_reviews.text: Love it. and appreciate that the seller sent me a new one when my other was out of warranty because they wanted me to happy with their product!!! Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice Looking and Sturdy. So far this case has been great!! I've only been using it for 5 days, but I have my license and 2 other cards in the 3 slots, a gift card and folded dollar bill in the side pocket and it closes perfectly with no bulging. I looks nice and it's sturdy. I'll try to check back in after a few months to share how it's holding up. One of the LUPA owners reached out and offered support if anything goes wrong. I appreciate that. Customer service is very important.
customer_reviews.author: GCM

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: As much as I love this case, I’m going to have to find a different one. For once, it wears easily. I’ve had my second one since June and it’s already falling apart. My phone also accidentally dropped and cracked even though I have a screen protector on. The case doesn’t provide protection along the edges of the phone, hence the crack when it fell. Needless to say, I love how I can have everything I need in one hand and not have to worry about carrying a purse or a wallet. Maybe find a material that has a lasting durability. But I guess for the price it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and sensible phone case
customer_reviews.text: I love my new iPhone 8 wallet case! The phone snaps inside easily, all functions are accessible while in the case, and the magnetic closure works perfectly and feels as though it will last a long, long time. The credit card slots and bill holder are a plus. I have placed my library card and B&N card inside, and you can place one card per slot (3 total) without overloading the case. For those of you looking for a full wallet/phone case, this one isn't it. But for a great, attractive case with a little extra room for a few dollars and three credit-card-size cards, this is perfect! A quality item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy K.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: Cards are now starting to come through the side of the card slot. Other than that it’s been a great case. Other magnetic closure flaps have worn out on me from leaving the case open/folded over. This ones holding up. Looks really nice on my black iPhone. Classy looking case, rich burgundy color. Looks like it cost a lot more than it did. Had it a few months and now inside material starting to wear thin, hence lower slot for credit card bursting at the side.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Not for a Busy Farmer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone case upon the recommendation of a friend who loves his Lupa phone case;however, my husband -a busy farmer for whom I bought it, does not like it. He says the flap makes it hard to slip in & out of his pocket. He doesn't like having to open the flap to answer the phone. He used it for a few days & put his old case back on. I wish it fit my Galaxy 7 phone. I would like it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Margie M Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great reasonably priced phone case
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a great deal - it includes a screen protector (I couldn’t get two small air bubbles out sadly) but value for money it can’t be beat. I got this for my daughter as she lost her bus pass and I’m hoping the card holder built in will help. Overall for the money it’s a solid case with a magnetic fastener which is solid. Very happy with the purchase. Came in a pretty box with a one year waranty if you register the purchase. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: A Mac

customer_reviews.title: Love my Lupa
customer_reviews.text: From the moment I opened my Lupa Wallet iPhone I was very pleased. From the packaging, presentation, and the look. It is good quality, great fit and I love the color. It serves my purpose. All my information neatly organized in a small handy package. I have gotten many compliments and inquiries as to where this wallett can be found. I highly recommend this Lupa Wallet !
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Edges are coming off
customer_reviews.text: I love the design, love the inside but unfortunately is not durable. About 6 months after the purchase, started to come a part.
customer_reviews.author: Frederico Martins

customer_reviews.title: I feel like my phone is secure
customer_reviews.text: I really really love this little guy! I was worried about my phone slipping out but the case definitely isn't going anywhere! It holds on tight to my phone and my cards. I recommend not putting too many cards into the slots because it seems like over time, they may stretch out. it also comes with a screen protector and its a pretty good quality one, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Brown

customer_reviews.title: No more (literal) pain-in-the-arse wallet...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It’s sturdy, and a very nice color. The closing-magnet is most certainly sufficient, and hasn’t caused (concern for potential) damage to my device or cards. My only gripe is that it can be awkward to hold at times where some one-handed dexterity would be of benefit-a consideration I didn’t give prior. So, shame on me. Most of all, it’s ridiculous, really, how much I love not constantly sitting on a wallet. 20+ years of that crap... good grief. Never. Again.
customer_reviews.author: ShyGuy

customer_reviews.title: The iPhone is slim and classy.
customer_reviews.text: My iphone 8 wallet case is terrific. I like the slim look and the leather feel of the case. It is classy! It arrived in a lovely box in a cushioned slide out drawer!! Wow!! Who does that? And now they want to know if I had problems or feedback...I'm so glad I purchased my iPhone case at LUPA! Enclosed in the case were two business cards, one to register a warranty. The cards were classy also! I need to check out their charity program too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A One and Done Phone Case
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband who is always searching in his pockets for phone, cash, credit cards etc. With this phone case, he can carry everything he needs in one slim case. The phone fits perfectly with plenty of room for credit cards, license and even a few dollar. Since he always carries his phone, now he can have everything in one tidy case.
customer_reviews.author: JoEllen D Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the design of case - it easily held 3 or 4 cards, plus my house key fit in the pocket behind them. But the side of the pocket tore at the seam after a couple months from regular shifting of the cards, and after a few drops (what's a phone case for?) the part that holds the phone degraded and the phone now only stays in when the case is closed. No bueno. Liked it for a couple months, but replacing it now with a rubber case that I can feel safer with.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Genay

customer_reviews.title: Product description
customer_reviews.text: To whom it may concern, I received this LUPA iPhone 6S wallet case as a Christmas gift from my husband. The description on the Amazon web site stated that a screen protector was included. Unfortunately the screen protector did not come with this product. I called Amazon customer service and was told that the screen protector was not part of this product and they believed it was an error on the description. You can clearly see the picture of the product with the screen protector. I was told that I needed to purchase a screen protector separately. I like the case but I am disappointed that I did not receive what was advertised on this product. Thank You! Isabel Marques
customer_reviews.author: paul marques

customer_reviews.title: I am hoping the card hope the slots for our cards will continue to stay strong
customer_reviews.text: I have had many Apple I phone wallet cases, this one is by far my favorite. I’m so excited to have finally found THE ONE for me Teresa Question my girlfriend loves mine she has a 10 is there a wallet case out there for her phone? I am looking for a 10 for my friend as well. I haven’t had any luck thus far. She loves mine and wants one. Please keep me posted if you find The Apple 10 wallet case. Thank you so much Teresa
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Easy. Looks Good. Not as versatile as I thought.
customer_reviews.text: I misunderstood the photos in the ad and thought that I would be able to use an independent case AND/OR the wallet feature. But the phone is stuck inside the wallet and wallet flap will need to be folded back for me to use it. It wasn't exactly what I thought I was getting. Still, it is an attractive piece, and I will use it as is for the time being. It is not bulky and will do the job in an attractive manner, for now.
customer_reviews.author: Pashanan

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: This case is excellent. I recently had a mishap with my phone - someone knocked it out of my hand so hard that it hit a wall before it hit the floor. The case protected my phone completely. Additionally, I no longer have to carry my purse and wallet, which is a plus for a teacher. I recommend this case to anyone looking to lighten their load and adding protection to their phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kate S-L

customer_reviews.title: Can’t take photos with this holder
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and I love the look but you can’t take photos because the camera hole on the cover does not line up with the phone. Very disappointed. It’s too difficult to remove the phone every time you want to take a photo.
customer_reviews.author: Trainor Bird

customer_reviews.title: Hard to hear....
customer_reviews.text: Hard to hear people and vice versa. And sometimes when I went to answer a call it wouldn’t connect. I thought it was my phone but I got another case and the problem has stopped. The case itself is really nice tho. It looks like great quality. My phone fit perfectly. But if you can’t hear people and miss calls the phone case is bad.
customer_reviews.author: Doey

customer_reviews.title: Where the strap connects isn’t reinforced well enough.
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great! But I only had for about 2 weeks and the area where the strap attaches to the case, completely tore out. So now I have no wrist strap and there is a big hole at the top of the cases spine. I’m pretty disappointed because I really liked the rest of the case.... UPDATE I’ve had the case for a couple of months now and the leather/rubber is peeling off of the corners of the hard part of the case. I know it was cheap but I expected it to last a little longer.....
customer_reviews.author: Sara F

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got a iPhone 6S, and I didn't like that it is so thin and slippery. I went on Amazon to see what they had to protect it, and I found the LUPA iPhone 6S Wallet case. It seemed to be exactly what I was looking for. It arrived yesterday, and it is exactly what I was looking for. It's beautiful and it looks very high-end. My girlfriend is looking for a wallet case for her phone, and I am going to suggest she looks at the LUPA website. I'm really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: WilJay

customer_reviews.title: Well made, fits iPhone perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made wallet case, fits my iPhone perfectly. Good price, arrived within 2 days of ordering, and item was as described. Great customer service from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Rob255

customer_reviews.title: exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Great case for the price. My mom needed a better case for her iPhone and was envious of my dad's Otterbox Strada case. She's retired and on a fixed income so a $40 case was not feasible for her. After a little hunting on Amazon we decided on this one and it was well worth it. She's extremely happy with the look and feel of this case, it's a very good dupe for a Strada case.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing. Not protective.
customer_reviews.text: This case was not protective at all. It’s mostly only about the wallet. I dropped my phone from about 18 inches off the ground and it broke the screen. The corners of the case don’t protect at all. Also, it’s started to come apart after only 2 months. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K8kitt

customer_reviews.title: !!YOU MUST REMOVE CASE FOR CHARGING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful case but don’t plan on charging your phone while it’s in the case. The edge near the charge port was not created for that. And the the edges deteriorate further from removing everytime you must remove for charging.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette

customer_reviews.title: BROOOOOO
customer_reviews.text: I hate purses and I want my phone to fit in my pocket. This product is perfect for that. When it first arrived I was so impressed with the nice packaging and they even added a screen protector. As a consumer, that made me think that they were really thinking of me when they put this all together. The actual case still lets my phone fit in a women's jeans pocket (for those of you that don't know, they're ridiculously small). It's perfect for 3 cards and emergency cash. On the first day of class, my professor complimented me on the phone case. It looks professional and I'm so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wocicki

customer_reviews.title: Cannot hear me now !!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this case. Despite it APPEARING to not cover the microphone, people were not able to hear me when speaking on the phone. I troubleshot the issue by alternatively removing and reinstalling the case; others were unable to hear me when using as handheld with the case on my iPhone 8.
customer_reviews.author: MAY

customer_reviews.title: Wish it wouldn’t have broken
customer_reviews.text: I wish it would have held up. My case wasn’t put through the wringer or anything it just broke on the top right corner one day. Barely over three weeks of owning it. Luckily it was a couple days before the return window closed, but I wasn’t going to get another one after that. I hope the cases hold up better for other people.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey-Student

customer_reviews.title: effective, but started to fall apart after awhile
customer_reviews.text: I got this product back in September and it has so far been effective with carrying my cards. Although recently I have noticed some tear in the credit card pockets. If you are looking for a phone case that will carry your cards effectively for everyday use this is a great case to get. Even though it has begun to tear, I have had it for a few months and i guess that's just wear and tear. It would've been nice if it hadn't started breaking so soon. Overall good case, would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Soft  and sassy looking... Just like me!
customer_reviews.text: Luv n this already! Ordered this on Friday eve. Arrived on Sunday afternoon. Talk about quick. Although I have had this for only an afternoon, I can’t speak for its durability but it does look and feel great! The color is beautiful and true to the color of my phone which is rose gold. Great compartment for drivers license and debit card. Also can hold a dollar or two. The magnetic clasp is well made, and snaps easily. Camera works perfect. Nit covered up. Easy Access to all phone switches. Very elegant looking... Cannot say anything bad about this yet. Lovely, lovely, lovely! Cannot quit looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! They made sure there is enough room ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! They made sure there is enough room to put stuff in the wallet side and still close comfortably. The color is beautiful and I have had this case now for over a month. The magnet works well and I even stuck on a popsocket and have had no issues with it sticking. I'm looking at another color to switch things up! Edit: just received my second one in burgundy and I love it!! Ya have to try one!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: “It’s perfect!”
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone wallet as a gift for my son who was tired of wearing pants with a bulging pocket due to a fat, unmanageable wallet. I also wanted it as protection for his brand new iPhone 8 in case of a dropped device. It solved both problems and lies flat and inconspicuous in his slim-cut jeans and slacks. He just started using it, but it looks as though it will last forever. We’re both very happy to have found LUPA products!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Amazon

customer_reviews.title: It was great... at first :(
customer_reviews.text: Okay when I first got this I LOVED IT. The idea of not having too much to hold is awesome! I always lose my wallet so this was amazing AT FIRST. I quickly realized that the area that holds your cards is glued together and not stitched. The other day I went to pull my ID out and literally took one of the dividers out with it. I’ve only had this item a few months. This is poorly made and I would suggest spending a few more dollars to invest in a phone/wallet duo that will hold up. Mine looks like I’ve had it for years.
customer_reviews.author: kristen ennis

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in November 2019. The corners have worn quickly and unusually. This product is primarily carried within a purse with minimal items.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Babb

customer_reviews.title: Good case, just not easy to prop up
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the dark brown case and it looked really nice. The color was what I expected it to be and it was surprisingly slim and compact. One of the things I didn’t like was front flap didn’t fold in half like my previous case which made it hard to prop up. I guess not including that feature did make it more slim, so its not that bad. Also, I noticed some people in the reviews wrote about how the camera won’t fit. That is completely the customer’s fault because you have to order the one that corresponds with what phone you have. Disregard those reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Nadya

customer_reviews.title: making it easy to find in my purse
customer_reviews.text: The case is lovely substance and color, making it easy to find in my purse. Not only does it have 3 inserts for credit or business cards, it also has an insert for bills or notes and includes a screensaver. My previous case was a bit thinner but it also had a slot in the case that allowed me to turn my phone off or on. Unfortunately many times, without my knowledge, sliding my phone into a pocket in my purse also slid that switch. This case fully covers the phone and the magnetic tab is helpful. So far it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: So small... no room for cards
customer_reviews.text: I the same LIPA case on my iPhone 6 and loved it. However, when my case for the new iPhone SE 2020 arrived, it was so tight that I was unable to get more than three credit cards in and shut the case. (The product description says, “plenty of space for your smart phone and 3 or 4 credit and ID cards... and room for 4 bills.)
customer_reviews.author: Eugene D Pate Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and feels good
customer_reviews.text: I love the feeling of having this case while using my phone. In the past couple of months, I have tried case-free experience because I felt that a case typically undermines the phone's texture when you hold it. However, lately, I have had a feeling that the metal feeling when I held my caseless phone gave me this cold texture that I didn't enjoy either. So I realized that the material of the case is what actually matters. So I searched for a leather case with a front cover to minimize touching the cold texture of the phone. I really am glad to have found this one. Great color and great texture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but not terribly sturdy?
customer_reviews.text: It LOOKS and FEELS very nice in the hands, but its design is not very strong. It’s already got a broken frame from the part that holds my phone, and my phone sometimes unexpectedly pops out. For some reason it’s really rough on my credit cards, too. I blame this mostly on the fact that I’m a tomboy that rough-and-tumbles possessions a little too much, but I’m looking for something that will hold up to the beatings it will incidentally get from being my possession (you should see my poor work tools). So, if you’re able to handle things more delicately than I’m capable of, it’s quite lovely. It’s sadly not functional for me.
customer_reviews.author: lillith665

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my case for about a year and half now. Leather/pleather is still in excellent shape. I stuffed like 2 cards per slotted card holder the entire time and it never tore like my previous one from a mall kiosk. My iPhone has fallen face down many times and it never broke the screen however yesterday it fell at the perfect angle and my iPhone cracked. The plastic casing that holds the phone in place also broke so now I’m ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Toya

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, durable, looks great
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a good looking, durable wallet case to protect your expensive investment, look no further. It looks great, fits like a glove, and functions as intended (the wife's phone has survived more than a few drops without a scratch ;-). Included in the handsome packaging is a high-quality case with screen protector and clear installation instructions. With so many choices in this segment, this cover is definitely worth the slight premium and is highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Avinash Sarin

customer_reviews.title: To tight.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and you can grit up to 5 credit cards. But try to fold it it is very hard and unsightly... Nice try but not super satisfied with this one....
customer_reviews.author: Milos Stevanovic

customer_reviews.title: Attractive functional cell phone case
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect. I bought it so I can carry my cell phone, DL, and a couple payment cards without the need for my heavy purse. It protects the phone and closes securely. It will not close properly if you try to put more than 3 cards and a license in it. There is no room for cash or coins. But this case suits my purpose. It comes in many colors too!
customer_reviews.author: readsalot

customer_reviews.title: Four and 1/2 stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Seems durable and fits the phone perfectly. The crease in the fold over takes a few days to be broken in properly so that the case feels comfortable in your hand while you are on the phone. Looks very nice. I love that this one left a hole for the Apple to show through as so many wallet cases do not. Looks more expensive than the price. I do wish there was a little wider seam so that I could fit another card or two in the slots and still be able to close the case and have it stay closed. Four or five cards, and a few bills seems to be its limit.
customer_reviews.author: E. C. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Not durable; careful what you buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought cases like this in the past and had them last close to a year without any serious damage to the case. This case is not up to par. The compartments for the cards stretch out quickly, so careful your cards or cash don't slip out. The lining of the inside compartment splits away easily and is of a cheaper material than the outside. The faux leather covering the plastic piece that actually holds the phone peels off quickly just from the stress of removing from jeans pockets. Make sure you have a tempered glass sheet on your screen, because a single drop will shatter the plastic casing and leave your screen at risk!
customer_reviews.author: Stirack

customer_reviews.title: Lid or front flap does not close properly
customer_reviews.text: It feels nice in my hand but I thought it was a deep sage green and not a smoky blue.. most importantly, the lid doesn’t close properly with even one credit card or drivers license. The inside of the flap/hinge needs to be an eighth of an inch wider. I would buy others but with the lid not closing properly, this will probably be my last purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Robinson

customer_reviews.title: 🙁🙁🙁
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the fact that there isn’t a lot of protection for the phone. The bottom of my iPhone is bare and so is the top. I paid almost 20 dollars for this case, I expect a little more cover up. Overall, it’s okay but they should work on the part that holds the phone. Also, the case doesn’t close very well with the cards in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya

product_meta.title: LUPA iPhone 6, 6s Wallet Case, Durable and Slim, Lightweight with Classic Design & Ultra-Strong Magnetic Closure, Faux Leather, Burgundy, Apple 6/6s (4.7 in)
feature_bullets: Travel Lighter: Holds an iPhone 6 or 6s, 3-4 credit & ID cards and up to 4 bills (more than other brands!). Full access to all ports. Ultra-strong magnetic closure provides security & peace of mind.
Durable Protection: Covers all four corners of your iPhone and includes raised edges to prevent screen scratches. Plus, get a BONUS PE screen protector with every purchase!
Made to Last: Rugged, eco-friendly & lightweight PU leather resists stretching & fading over timeÑand even stands up to the occasional splash or drop on the ground.
Upscale Quality with Timeless Style: Crafted from premium faux leather, with a classic, vintage-style design. Exquisitely packaged & makes a great gift.

100% Product Guarantee: Your satisfaction matters! If this wallet case doesn't make a winning impression, let us know. We'll promptly reimburse you for every cent of the purchase price. (Please note that this case does NOT fit iPhone 6/6s Plus)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars10,713 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Slim fit, lightweight, magnetic closure,durable, card slots
